QuestData.Title: Knocking On Death's Door
QuestData.Description:
This is it, mortal. The forces you have assembled should be enough to break through the Mawsworn and reach the Crypts. Getting inside, however, will require more effort. The Mawsworn have barricaded the entrance.
Kbato will carry you into battle. Eliminate the Mawsworn, and destroy the devices that power the barrier.
QuestData.LogDescription: Riding Kbato, defeat the Mawsworn forces in the Endless Sands and open the way to the Crypts of the Eternal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Firim and the others inside the Crypt of the Eternal.
QuestData.RewardText: By the First Ones... I never dreamed I would see this place with my own eyes.

Objectives.Objective: Shadow Bulwark destroyed with Twin Beams
